messages.message: Hi, what is this app in prod? Should it be there?
it’s showing up outside just the `Instabase` org as well

This is built by @eddie.hou!

The app does following
Given a Arztbriefe (doctor's letter), it pulls the diagnosis from the letter and the matching ICD-10 codes.

cc @Venkatesh
nice! We should probably update the app though so it’s styling is consistent with our other public apps
we should put this app in Org Solutions -- not in public marketplace
@Venkatesh @Arjun sounds good, I'll make it consistent with the other apps. Working with @Travis to get the icon to show properly after API upload

For styling, we need:
• By Instabase (it will have to be published from the IB publishing account)
• App Icon
In the future, I'd love to review new apps before we publish to the marketplace.
@eddie.hou to update the icon you can just replace the `icon.png` file within the `/system/global/fs/...` directory of the app in question.
to access  the file system does require a site admin account, though I am not 100% sure if even this allows access to the FS on prod

@Venkatesh @Anant Yes, it is a generic problem and we encountered it at almost every big insurance we engaged with. 3 Business Units at Allianz alone in 3 different countries + a few other german insurers. ICD-10 is a complex documents process across health insurances. I recommend this app to definitely be visible :wink:
